Travel Articles | July 2, 2015 
First of all, sometimes you need a holiday where you can just relax in the lap of nature and not run through a hectic plan stuffed with a lot of travelling and sightseeing. You can include activities like camping, caravanning, hiking, nature walk, angling and so on in your holidays. These activities are ideal to introduce your children to the beauties of nature which they miss in urban settings.

If this sounds alluring then a piece of good news is that you do not need not worry about where to go for your holidays, there are several campsites Cambridgeshire that offer splendid facilities. You can enjoy caravanning Cambridgeshire or stay in the many lodges at the campsites.The best campsites Cambridgeshire are situated on the banks of the River Great Ouse. You can book a caravan pitch when you decide to travel with your own caravan or mobile home. There are facilities for pitching your caravan on the campsite. You can book caravans, motor homes or tents whatever your family wants. When you book in advance you can get caravans that offer river view. The campsite has luxury caravans armed with all modern facilities. High standard toilets, showers and separate laundry room are set up for your comfort and convenience. Caravanning Cambridgeshire will surely give you a unique opportunity to set a tryst with nature.You can enjoy the best of the riverfront, both in terms of the lovely view as well as outdoor activities like angling and boating. The campsites Cambridgeshire will make all the necessary arrangements for you and your family if you wish to hire rowing boats. Quiet boat rides down the river will allow you to appreciate the flora and fauna by the riverside. If you desire to venture out on the ground then hiking or cycling is ideal. Caravanning Cambridgeshire has facilities for hiring cycles for your family and you can set off on an exciting trip across the countryside. Some caravan parks also have mobile homes exclusively for senior citizens with all conveniences on offer.You can visit the nearby villages and enjoy the quaint atmosphere there. The church, the village hall and the local inn are worth a visit. Campsites Cambridgeshire are well connected and are within easy reach with London City being only an hourâ€™s drive away. For students and visiting faculty at Cambridge University, caravanning Cambridgeshire offers a great getaway from their busy and hectic schedule. Charges for caravan pitches and camping vary according to the seasons and holidays. For hiring caravan pitches for summer or winter you can book in advance. All the pitches are concretized and security is quite tight.Campsites Cambridgeshire offer several recreational activities and in case of inclement weathers your children and other family members will not get bored. They can enjoy and keep themselves occupied in the evenings after a day out in the sun. Caravanning Cambridgeshire will be a great experience as you get the feel of an adventure staying in a mobile home. Electricity, water supply and Wi-Fi connection make your stay relaxed and easy.
